entry.title: Liz Truss's Inheritance: A U.K. Economy on Its Knees
entry.content: The new prime minister faces record inflation, a faltering pound, spiraling energy costs and an ill-timed labor shortage.

entry.title: A RussianSoldier's Inside View of Moscow's War in Ukraine
entry.content: Pavel Filatyev, who left the army, is one of the most outspoken veterans of the conflict, detailing what he calls the Russian militaryâ€™s failings in Ukraine in interviews and a 141-page written account published online.
